amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the use of funds by $49,000,000 for the Food and Drug Administration administrative expenses account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the use of funds by $49,000,000 for the Food and Drug Administration administrative expenses account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dingell amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 241 (Roll no. 440).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
